note:
I hereby grant royal permission to each and every one of you to nap along with me.

As long as you bring me Pancakes first.

Give me Pancakes and I will give you your soul back. But I am keeping the freckle. Don't poke the Redhead.

I do not accept random follow requests. Period. If we have not talked a number of times, or I don't already know you well from somewhere else- don't click that "Follow" button until we have had several decent civil conversations here. *Not a "friend collector".* #optout #nobridge

fields.name: LOCATION
fields.value: Somewhere near a plate of Pancakes, most likely.

fields.name: CURRENTLY DOING
fields.value: Napping, eating Pancakes, drinking too much coffee. Pick one or all...
